titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for Henry J. Abel papers 1918-1919, 1953, and 1964.
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Len Coombs

publicationstmt.publisher: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created by Len Coombs 2002-08
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English.

change.item: Original encoding in EAD ver. 1.0 from Word 6.0 file using Notepad, manual tagging in A/E.

titlepage.publisher:
Michigan Historical Collections
Bentley Historical Library
University of Michigan
titlepage.titleproper:
Finding Aid for
Henry J. Abel papers, 1918-1919, 1953, and 1964.
titlepage.author:
Finding aid prepared by:
Len Coombs

did.abstract: Soldier from Big Rapids, Mich., member of 339th U.S. Infantry who served in the Allied intervention in Russia, 1918-1920, the "Polar Bear Expedition." Collection includes photocopies of clippings, certificates, and miscellanea.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection was donated by Mrs. Mildred Abel Weis, of Big Rapids, Michigan, in 1988 (Donor no.: 7625).

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.p: item, folder title, Henry J. Abel papers, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Resident of Big Rapids, Michigan; soldier in the 339th Infantry.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of photocopies of clippings, certificates, and miscellanea.
